With the forecast of wet autumnal weather for the #Midlands tomorrow comes the risk of #flood. Are you prepared?

Step 1. Check your flood risk: https://t.co/Yu9SYkYtrI

Step 2. Sign up for free flood warnings

Step 3. Keep up to date: https://t.co/4HSc5MbL20 

Stay #FloodAware https://t.co/EITZOa92hA

tweets.text:
@EnvAgency plans to overhaul its river quality monitoring regime by introducing a new system that monitors water quality at randomly selected sites have been branded a ‚Äúload of rubbish‚Äù by its staff 

https://t.co/s5poEg9JZR

It seems Southern Water has insufficiently invested in its infrastructure and that's had devastating effects in #Bewbush!

Their record:
The lowest @EnvAgency ranking

¬£212 million profit last year but paid no corporation tax

Clearly, water privatisation has failed local people. https://t.co/fFctAFWNo1

@AngharadStone @_megtonner @EnvAgency @perry_jims Hi Angharad, someone who can talk about flood risk at a national level with stats to show what we're up against. We'll have other speakers talking about approaches elsewhere in the world (particularly the Netherlands) and looking at local (Bristol) challenges.
@PippaGoldfinger For the second part of your request, we'll need to find someone from @EnvAgencySW who covers the Bristol patch

@AngharadStone @_megtonner @EnvAgency @perry_jims Hi Angharad, someone who can talk about flood risk at a national level with stats to show what we're up against. We'll have other speakers talking about approaches elsewhere in the world (particularly the Netherlands) and looking at local (Bristol) challenges.

How it started...                        How it‚Äôs going... 
                                                 üåæüí™üåæüí™
#DuneFencing #SandAccretion #DuneAppreciationSociety
#HowItStarted #HowItsGoing #SandDuneSuccess https://t.co/LeMbei7Cc4

@PippaGoldfinger @EnvAgency @perry_jims Hi Pippa, please DM us about this to have a chat about what you‚Äôre looking for. We‚Äôre based at @UniOfHull and may be able to link you up with an academic ‚ò∫Ô∏è

The @EnvAgency has denied conflict of interest rules may have been breached after it emerged one of its senior employees was leaving to join a water company that is under criminal investigation by the watchdog.
https://t.co/nA77g7qxUS

@_megtonner @PippaGoldfinger @EnvAgency @perry_jims Ha - thanks Megan but I may pass this on to actual experts. @PippaGoldfinger What are you after, as flood is quite a big topic? Local focused, education of the risk of flooding, flood defence and alleviation?

@SESatHull mobile lab is ready and set in Cumbria for water sampling! Cleaned, set-up and tested Monday afternoon with samples from the first lake @eyorksbirding @BerndHaenfling @EnvAgency https://t.co/SmpJmr1Iyp

@ana_captures @beckettrankine @CharltonCSE7 @XRGreenwich @SilvertownTn @pedalmeapp @livingstreets @TransportActio2 @Royal_Greenwich @TfL @EnvAgency @mtpennycook @SadiqKhan @DanLThorpe Hi Ana it was a proposal sent to TfL in 2017. 
We brought it up now as an inspired, cleaner, cheaper, Greener, more 2020-friendly alternative to the no cycling/cargo bike #SilvertownTunnel.
